message.content: This question requires knowledge about environmentally-friendly practices. To do something good for the environment, a person should put plastic in special containers for recycling. Option (A) is incorrect because having more children increases the population and consumption, which can have negative environmental impacts. Option (B) is incorrect because throwing away plastic containers contributes to pollution and waste. Option (D) is incorrect because burning rubber shoes releases toxic fumes and contributes to air pollution. Putting plastic in special containers for recycling ensures that it can be reused or properly disposed of, reducing the environmental impact.

This question requires basic knowledge about taking actions to benefit the environment. Option (C) is the correct answer because putting plastic in special containers, such as recycling bins or designated recycling programs, helps to reduce plastic waste and promote recycling. Option (A) is incorrect because having more children can contribute to overpopulation and strain on environmental resources. Option (B) is incorrect because throwing away plastic containers adds to landfill waste and environmental pollution. Option (D) is incorrect because burning old rubber shoes can release harmful toxins into the air.
